body: Look for a [family meet-up group](https://www.meetup.com/find/parents-family/) or [single parents network](https://www.meetup.com/find/?allMeetups=false&keywords=single+parent+support&radius=50&userFreeform=London%2C+United+Kingdom&mcId=z1012717&mcName=London%2C+England%2C+GB&sort=default&eventFilter=mysugg) in your area. Both work in the same way as forums but the focus is usually on meeting face to face.
heading: Find a group near you
